release.note: Removed some dependencies that I had left in for testing.
Enable IDE Debug output programatically instead of by editing the Clarion.exe.config file.
DbgView.exe is now launched with the '/f' argument to not show the filter dialog. Without this, if you had a filter configured then DbgView would not be attached to the pad
`Bug #45 <http://support.fushnisoft.com/thebuggenie/clarionaddins/issues/45>`_ - If DebugView is already running then this addin will attach it to the DebugView pad

`Bug #45 <http://support.fushnisoft.com/thebuggenie/clarionaddins/issues/45>`_ - If a DebugView process is found but no MainWindowHandle is available then this addin will attempt to kill the running process and restart DebugView so it can attach it to the DebugView pad
DebugView is now opened and attached using a BackgroundWorker so as not to block IDE startup.
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Options panel is now in ClarionAddins options section!
Catch possible null ref exception after locating process.
